segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 35
segments.en: Linked Discourses 35

segments.pli: 13. Gahapativagga
segments.en: 13. Householders

segments.pli: 129. Ghositasutta
segments.en: 129. With Ghosita

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
segments.en: At one time Venerable Ānanda was staying near Kosambi, in Ghosita’s Monastery.

segments.pli: Atha kho ghosito gahapati yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami … pe … ekamantaṃ nisinno kho ghosito gahapati āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then the householder Ghosita went up to Venerable Ānanda, and said to him:

segments.pli: “‘dhātunānattaṃ, dhātunānattan’ti, bhante ānanda, vuccati.
segments.en: “Sir, Ānanda, they speak of ‘the diversity of elements’.

segments.pli: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti?
segments.en: In what way did the Buddha speak of the diversity of elements?”

segments.pli: “Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhātu, rūpā ca manāpā, cakkhuviññāṇañca sukhavedaniyaṃ.
segments.en: “Householder, the eye element is found, as are agreeable sights, and eye consciousness.

segments.pli: Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhā vedanā.
segments.en: Pleasant feeling arises dependent on a contact to be experienced as pleasant.

segments.pli: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhātu, rūpā ca amanāpā, cakkhuviññāṇañca dukkhavedaniyaṃ.
segments.en: The eye element is found, as are disagreeable sights, and eye consciousness.

segments.pli: Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhā vedanā.
segments.en: Painful feeling arises dependent on a contact to be experienced as painful.

segments.pli: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhātu, rūpā ca manāpā upekkhāvedaniyā, cakkhuviññāṇañca adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ.
segments.en: The eye element is found, as are sights that are a basis for equanimity, and eye consciousness.

segments.pli: Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā … pe …
segments.en: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a contact to be experienced as neutral.

segments.pli: saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhādhātu, rasā ca manāpā, jivhāviññāṇañca sukhavedaniyaṃ.
segments.en: The ear … nose … tongue … body …

segments.pli: Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhā vedanā.
Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhādhātu, rasā ca amanāpā, jivhāviññāṇañca dukkhavedaniyaṃ.
Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhā vedanā.
Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhādhātu, rasā ca upekkhāvedaniyā, jivhāviññāṇañca adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ.
Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā … pe …
saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhātu, dhammā ca manāpā, manoviññāṇañca sukhavedaniyaṃ.
segments.en: mind element is found, as are agreeable thoughts, and mind consciousness.

segments.pli: Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhā vedanā.
segments.en: Pleasant feeling arises dependent on a contact to be experienced as pleasant.

segments.pli: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhātu, dhammā ca amanāpā, manoviññāṇañca dukkhavedaniyaṃ.
segments.en: The mind element is found, as are disagreeable thoughts, and mind consciousness.

segments.pli: Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhā vedanā.
segments.en: Painful feeling arises dependent on a contact to be experienced as painful.

segments.pli: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhātu, dhammā ca upekkhāvedaniyā, manoviññāṇañca adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ.
segments.en: The mind element is found, as are thoughts that are a basis for equanimity, and mind consciousness.

segments.pli: Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
segments.en: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a contact to be experienced as neutral.

segments.pli: Ettāvatā kho, gahapati, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti.
segments.en: This is how the Buddha spoke of the diversity of elements.”

segments.pli: Chaṭṭhaṃ.

sections.title: At one time Venerable Ānanda was staying near Kosambi,…

suttaplex.blurb: The householder Ghosita asks Ānanda about the diversity of elements, and he answers in terms of the elements of sense experience.
